title: Optimizing workflow efficiency for analyzing low molecular weight endogenous peptides in colostrum
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29189-29200
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03199G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Priti Panchal, Reeju Rani, Rohit Kumar, Seema Malik, Manishi Mukesh, Jai Kumar Kaushik, Monika Sodhi, Ashok Kumar Mohanty, Sudarshan Kumar
A novel approach to extract EPs from colostrum using peptide extraction methods combined with ultracentrifugation was developed. Over 3200 EPs were extracted from bovine colostrum enabling the identification of less abundant proteins and peptides.
